definition[1]: relating to words or using words
example[1]: verbal abuse  (=cruel words) from other kids on the street
definition[3]: a word that has been formed from a verb, for example a gerund, infinitive, or participle
definition[4]: relating to criticism, complaints, or an attack that you express in speech
example[3]: Maria was getting loads of verbal from her staff.
definition[5]: a verbal contract, agreement etc is one that is spoken rather than written
example[4]: The bank manager gaveverbal assurances of the security of the investments.
